code: class  Solution  {   public :   bool  isThree ( int  n )  {   if  ( n  ==  1 )   return  false ;       const  int  root  =  sqrt ( n );   return  root  *  root  ==  n  &&  isPrime ( root );   }   private :   bool  isPrime ( int  num )  {   for  ( int  i  =  2 ;  i  <=  sqrt ( num );  ++ i )   if  ( num  %  i  ==  0 )   return  false ;   return  true ;   }  };
